text:
January 11, 1958
Dr, Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio, Film
State University of Iowa
Television Center
609 10th Avenue
Coral villa, Iowa
Dear Sams
Since you’ll undoubtedly have a certain amount of correspondence to carry
on in the name of the NAEB, I'm sending you 100 letterheads and envelopes.
Also sending Ken Harwood 20 of each, in case he needs in connection with
grants-in-aid.
Our best regards.
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc .
